channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Static Analysis Utilities Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Static Analysis Utilities Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10308|2024-08-04T22:17:20.358Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20static%20analysis%20utilities%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Static Analysis Utilities Plugin 1.95 and earlier in the DefaultGraphConfigurationView#doSave form handler method allowed attackers with Overall/Read permission to change the per-job default graph configuration for all users.

item.title: CVE-2019-10307|2024-08-04T22:17:20.355Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20static%20analysis%20utilities%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Static Analysis Utilities Plugin 1.95 and earlier in the DefaultGraphConfigurationView#doSave form handler method allowed attackers to change the per-job default graph configuration for all users.

item.title: CVE-2020-2316|2024-08-04T07:09:54.329Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20static%20analysis%20utilities%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Static Analysis Utilities Plugin 1.96 and earlier does not escape the annotation message in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.
